nodes.text: Vortexlex, or Vorese, was the native language of the Vor species from Vortex. Vorese used soft chirps, lilting squawks, and trilling whistles to form a melodic language to hear.
Vorese had its own alphabet, using diamond shapes and swirling lines to represent individual letters.
Most Vors were fluent in both Vorese and Basic, although they were only literate in their own language.
